name: Wscript Shell Run In CommandLine
description: Detects the presence of the keywords "Wscript", "Shell" and "Run" in the command, which could indicate a suspicious activity
false_positives: Rare legitimate inline scripting by some administrators
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*Wscript.* AND process.command_line:*.Shell* AND process.command_line:*.Run*)`
